title: The World at Work: Hackers Wanted
text:
Sponsored by Bank of America Sponsored by Bank of America video The World at Work The World at Work: Hackers Wanted 12:44pm EDT - 03:14
Here's a startling tech stat: By 2021, cyber crimes are expected to cost the world $6 trillion, with 3.5 million cyber security jobs unfilled. To cope with the job crunch, companies are getting creative when it comes to recruiting and training a new generation of 'trusted hackers.'
